quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: But what is life if you don't live it?
author: James Patterson,  Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas

quote: I donâ€™t know what it means to live.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore

quote: What am I living for and what am I dying for are the same question.
author: Margaret Atwood,  The Year of the Flood

quote: I like living. I have sometimes been wildly, despairingly, acutely miserable, racked with sorrow; but through it all I still know quite certainly that just to be alive is a grand thing.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: When you can live forever what do you live for?
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: What's the good of living if you don't try a few things?
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: You can't have living without dying. So you can't call it living, what we got. We just are, we just be, like rocks beside the road.
author: Natalie Babbitt,  Tuck Everlasting

quote: Live simply so that others may simply live.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The secret to living is loving.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live free or die.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem

quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.
author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn

quote: To live is to choose. But to choose well, you must know who you are and what you stand for, where you want to go and why you want to get there.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: Life is a gift, but living is a choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: To live is to be haunted.
author: Philip K. Dick,  Flow My Tears, the Policeman Said

quote: Life, for the living, is a gift of opportunity; an exercise of the will to choose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Live your life, no matter what that life is.
author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good

quote: You are not here merely to making a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: One must try to make one's life as pleasant as possible. I'm alive and it's not my fault, which means I must somehow go on living the best I can, without bothering anybody, until I die.''But what makes you live? With such thoughts, you'll sit without moving, without undertaking anything...''Life won't leave one alone as it is.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: I want to Live! Not Die, Not Hide, LIVE!
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix,  Among the Hidden

quote: Live Long and Prosper
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: So much working, reading, thinking, living to do! A lifetime is not long enough.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Life is life. You choose to live it or you do not.
author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: Life must be lived as play.
author: Plato

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: Living is Easy with Eyes Closed.
author: John Lennon

quote: Living simply makes loving simple.
author: bell hooks

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: To travel is to live.
author: Hans Christian Andersen,  The Fairy Tale of My Life: An Autobiography

quote: The point of simple living, for me has got to be:A soft place to landA wide margin of errorRoom to breatheLots of places to find baseline happiness in each and every day
author: Leo Babauta

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Life isn't worth living, unless it is lived for someone else.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Living well is an art that can be developed: a love of life and ability to take great pleasure from small offerings and assurance that the world owes you nothing and that every gift is exactly that, a gift.
author: Maya Angelou,  Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: To live is not to breathe but to act. It is to make use of our organs, our senses, our faculties, of all the parts of ourselves which give us the sentiment of our existence. The man who has lived the most is not he who has counted the most years but he who has most felt life.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau,  Emile or On Education

quote: I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: life is a continous journey of transformation
author: Sukant Ratnakar,  Open the Windows

quote: Life will just not wait for us to live it:We are in it, now, and Now is the time to Live
author: Michelle Geaney

quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: Live to learn to love. Learn to love to live. Love to live to learn so that you may live the life that you yearn.
author: Rico Dasheem

quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
author: Voltaire

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I know many lives worth living.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: To live is to be musical, starting with the blood dancing in your veins. Everything living has a rhythm. Do you feel your music?
author: Michael Jackson
